abstract: The company presented a new algorithm for blending image-recognition software methods with techniques for weighting and ranking images that look most similar.
snippet: The company presented a new algorithm for blending image-recognition software methods with techniques for weighting and ranking images that look most similar.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  Google researchers say they have a software technology intended to do for digital images on the Web what the company’s original PageRank software did for searches of Web pages.

headline.main: A Google Prototype for a Precision Image Search
headline.print_headline: A Google Prototype for a Precision Image Search
